corporate gift."

settings.title: Flower Power Partnerships
settings.content:
Explore Opportunities to Join Speaking Roses -

Currently Welcoming Strategic Affiliate Partners, Local Distributors, Master Developers, Licensees, Ambassadors, and Influencers.

settings.content_column: We are located in 1536 North Woodland Park Drive, Suite #130, Layton, Utah 84042.

At Speaking Roses, we specialize in using carefully selected natural roses, hand-picked in the majestic mountains of South America. These flowers undergo a meticulous preservation process to safeguard their enduring beauty. Consequently, our roses remain exquisitely delicate without the need for special care like watering or sunlight exposure, ensuring that their timeless elegance lasts a lifetime.

settings.title_column: How does the licensing program work?
settings.content_column: We offer different licensing packages, including a world-class training program that teaches you all aspects of the business. Each package contains everything you need to start using your flower printer and selling speaking Roses immediately. To learn more about our licensing options and how to choose which licensing package is right for you, click here.

settings.title_column: What Is The Process Of Printing The Roses?
settings.content_column:
Over the past 20+ years, we have developed our cutting-edge printing process recognized worldwide for its exceptional quality. Prioritizing meticulous care and attention to detail for each rose, our printing methods are user-friendly, require minimal maintenance, and ensure precise results.

Our process is carefully designed to preserve the natural integrity of the flowers, guaranteeing vibrant colors without any damage.

Additionally, we hold patents for our revolutionary message printing techniques.

Our innovative approach combines state-of-the-art technology with a steadfast commitment to precision, resulting in stunning floral arrangements that eloquently convey heartfelt sentiments.

settings.title_column: How can I track the status of my order?
settings.content_column:
1 Look for your tracking number sent via email.

2 Click the link sent via email where you can check the status of your shipment.

Additionally, you will receive shipping updates via email after your purchase is complete.

For support:

contact us: Info@speakingroses.com

settings.title_column: What payment methods do you accept?
settings.content_column:
We accept the following payment methods:

Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover, Diners Club international, Apple Pay, Shop Pay, Google Pay, Meta Pay, and PayPal.

settings.title: Printing emotional experiences
settings.content:
Our mission at Speaking Roses transcends the act of gift-giving. We are dedicated to eliciting profound emotions in the hearts of recipients, encapsulated within the timeless beauty of our preserved roses.

Our distinctive approach is designed to forge a profound emotional connection with individuals, elevating the art of gifting to an unparalleled and extraordinary experience.

As a company, we proudly uphold a commitment to 100% emotional responsibility. We understand that every petal carries not just beauty but a sentiment that speaks volumes. At Speaking Roses, we craft more than bouquets;we create lasting impressions that linger in the hearts of those who receive them.
